doc.repnme: India - Sikkim rural drinking water : village water safety planning training
doc.abstracts: This report covers water safety planning for Sikkim, India’s rural drinking water system. It consists of two volumes. Volume I is a Training Manual. It begins with an introduction to water quality and public health. Section 2 covers the status of rural drinking water in Sikkim. Section 3 describes how to prepare a village water safety plan. It ends with several tables and figures. Volume II consists of six planning templates for the water safety plan: Technical and Financial Survey for Spring Source Gravity Flow Schemes; Water Source Plan; Water Safety Plan; Operating Plan; Service Improvement Plan; and Performance Indicators.
